item.title: Musk: AI5 will be an epic-level chip, and AI6 is expected to be the best AI chip to date
item.description: September 7th, Musk stated in a post that "Today witnessed an excellent AI5 chip design review with the Tesla AI chip team. AI5 is a remarkable one, and AI6 has the potential to be the best AI chip to date. Shifting from two to a single architecture implies that all Tesla AI chip talents will concentrate on one outstanding chip. I believe that AI5 could be the best for all inference chips for models with around 250B params or less, offering the lowest silicon cost to date and the highest performance per watt. AI6 will be even more superior."

item.title: The whale, who has profited $240.57 million from ETH, has deposited 21,178 ETH into Bitfinex.
item.description: On September 7th, as per the monitoring of OnchainLens, a whale that had remained dormant for six years deposited 21,178 ETH into Bitfinex. This deposit was valued at $90.74 million. Subsequently, the whale sent 37,760 ETH to two new wallets, with a value of $161.82 million.The whale's wallet originally received 58,938 ETH from Bitfinex, which was worth $12.02 million. Currently, it has achieved a profit of $240.57 million on its ETH holdings.

item.title: The crypto market has experienced a slight decline in the past 24 hours, with the total market capitalization dropping to $3.891 trillion.
item.description: On September 7th, according to Coingecko data, the total cryptocurrency market capitalization has decreased by 0.5% in the past 24 hours and dropped to $3.891 trillion. Based on HTX market information, Bitcoin briefly fell below $110,000 this morning and is currently trading at $110,292. Ethereum dropped below $4,300 and is now trading at $4,286. SOL briefly fell below $200 before rebounding to $201.2. The altcoin market has a mixed performance. The top gainers are:- SOMI is currently at $0.97, with a 24-hour increase of 62.3%.- NMR is currently at $17.5, with a 24-hour increase of 34.2%.- WLFI is currently at $0.2226, with a 24-hour increase of 22.3%.- MITO is currently at $0.224, with a 24-hour increase of 18.4%.The top losers are:- BIO is currently at $0.166, with a 24-hour decrease of 6%.- SYRUP is currently at $0.495, with a 24-hour decrease of 6%.- MKR is currently at $1715, with a 24-hour decrease of 5%.- SUN is currently at $0.02, with a 24-hour decrease of 4.9%.

item.title: NMR Short-Term Breakthrough $21, Surges Over 34.53% in 24 Hours
item.description: On September 7th, according to HTX market data, Numerai (NMR) surged this morning and broke through $21. It is now trading at $17.55, with a 24-hour gain of 34.53%. Earlier on August 27th, it was reported that Numerai received a commitment for an investment of up to $500 million from JPMorgan Chase.

item.title: Galaxy Digital deposited 175,000 SOL to Coinbase, worth $35.65 million
item.description: On September 7, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, Galaxy Digital deposited 175,000 SOL into Coinbase 8 hours ago, with a value of $35.65 million.Since August 27, Galaxy Digital has made a total deposit of 935,000 SOL into Coinbase, amounting to $191 million.

item.title: A Whale Increases Short Positions on ETH and BTC, Total Position Exceeds $200 Million
item.description: On September 7th, according to EmberCN's monitoring, a whale that initially took a long position on ETH and suffered a loss of $35.84 million switched to shorting BTC. Last night, the whale further increased their short position in BTC and also added a new short position on ETH. They currently hold a short position of $200 million with an unrealized gain of $1.5 million. Their positions are as follows:Short 1351 BTC at a leverage of 25 times, worth $150 million, with an entry price of $111,292 and a liquidation price of $114,770;Short 11,800 ETH at a leverage of 15 times, worth $50 million, with an entry price of $4,278 and a liquidation price of $4,798.

item.title: Bitcoin Mining Difficulty Increased by 4.89% to 136.04T, Reaching a New All-Time High, with a Seven-Day Average Network Hash Rate of 947.79EH/s
item.description: On September 7th, based on Cloverpool data, the Bitcoin mining difficulty underwent an adjustment at block height 913,248, experiencing a 4.89% increase to 136.04 T. The current average network hash rate over the past seven days is 947.79 EH/s.

item.title: A Certain Ethereum Foundation-Linked Address Moves 4,000 ETH After 9 Years of Dormancy
item.description: On September 7th, as monitored by Onchainlens, an address related to a certain Ethereum Foundation became dormant for 9 years and then transferred 4,000 ETH to a new wallet. The value of this transfer is $17.19 million.Addresses:- 0x0f08fd3f92ab62afcc372ea57eeef609b7114213- 0xACABE9d1bC52C3d94A50bc904288740563dd03B9

item.title: Bitcoin briefly falls below $110,000
item.description: On September 7th, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin briefly fell below $110,000, with a 0.38% decrease within the last 24 hours.

item.title: A whale deposited 3711 ETH into a CEX at an average price of $4294, resulting in an unrealized gain of $1.417 million.
item.description: On September 7th, according to the monitoring of on-chain analyst AI Auntie @ai_9684xtpa, it appears that the "Whale who accumulated ETH at an average price of $3,912 two years ago" has reduced their holdings. They recharged 3,711 ETH to Binance at a price of $4,294, with a total of about $15.93 million. If sold, they would make a profit of $1.417 million. Currently, the wallet still holds 3,000 ETH, with an unrealized gain of $1.13 million.
